The INSIDER Summary:
• It's fairly easy to make a margarita at home.
• Just combine tequila, triple sec, light amber agave, and lime juice in a shaker and then strain the mixture into a cocktail glass.
You don't need a special occasion to enjoy a margarita — in fact, you don't even need to leave your home to get a great one.
All you need is a shaker, a strainer, and the right alcohol.
Keep scrolling to see how.
